# GENERATED BY: test/dependency_services/dependency_services_test.dart

$ cat pubspec.yaml
{"name":"myapp","environment":{"sdk":">=0.1.2 <1.0.0"},"dependencies":{"foo":{"git":{"url":"../foo.git"}}}}
$ cat pubspec.lock
# Generated by pub
# See https://dart.dev/tools/pub/glossary#lockfile
packages:
  foo:
    dependency: "direct main"
    description:
      path: "."
      ref: HEAD
      resolved-ref: "1ae220cc484311a7a1e2e31d1ccc6ea995acb6ba"
      url: "file://$SANDBOX/foo.git"
    source: git
    version: "1.0.0"
sdks:
  dart: ">=0.1.2 <1.0.0"
-------------------------------- END OF OUTPUT ---------------------------------

## Section list
$ dependency_services list
{
  "dependencies": [
    {
      "name": "foo",
      "version": "1ae220cc484311a7a1e2e31d1ccc6ea995acb6ba",
      "kind": "direct",
      "constraint": "any"
    }
  ]
}

-------------------------------- END OF OUTPUT ---------------------------------

## Section report
$ dependency_services report
{
  "dependencies": [
    {
      "name": "foo",
      "version": "1.0.0",
      "kind": "direct",
      "latest": "2.0.0",
      "constraint": "any",
      "compatible": [
        {
          "name": "foo",
          "version": "ad2d659389d4475f6c3a34282e2204160b753fd9",
          "kind": "direct",
          "constraintBumped": "any",
          "constraintWidened": "any",
          "constraintBumpedIfNeeded": "any",
          "previousVersion": "1ae220cc484311a7a1e2e31d1ccc6ea995acb6ba",
          "previousConstraint": "any"
        }
      ],
      "singleBreaking": [
        {
          "name": "foo",
          "version": "ad2d659389d4475f6c3a34282e2204160b753fd9",
          "kind": "direct",
          "constraintBumped": "^2.0.0",
          "constraintWidened": "any",
          "constraintBumpedIfNeeded": "any",
          "previousVersion": "1ae220cc484311a7a1e2e31d1ccc6ea995acb6ba",
          "previousConstraint": "any"
        }
      ],
      "multiBreaking": [
        {
          "name": "foo",
          "version": "ad2d659389d4475f6c3a34282e2204160b753fd9",
          "kind": "direct",
          "constraintBumped": "^2.0.0",
          "constraintWidened": "any",
          "constraintBumpedIfNeeded": "any",
          "previousVersion": "1ae220cc484311a7a1e2e31d1ccc6ea995acb6ba",
          "previousConstraint": "any"
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}

-------------------------------- END OF OUTPUT ---------------------------------

## Section apply
$ echo '{"dependencyChanges":[{"name":"foo","version":"ad2d659389d4475f6c3a34282e2204160b753fd9"}]}' | dependency_services apply
{"dependencies":[]}

-------------------------------- END OF OUTPUT ---------------------------------

$ cat pubspec.yaml
{"name":"myapp","environment":{"sdk":">=0.1.2 <1.0.0"},"dependencies":{"foo":{"git":{"url":"../foo.git"}}}}
$ cat pubspec.lock
# Generated by pub
# See https://dart.dev/tools/pub/glossary#lockfile
packages:
  foo:
    dependency: "direct main"
    description:
      path: "."
      ref: HEAD
      resolved-ref: ad2d659389d4475f6c3a34282e2204160b753fd9
      url: "file://$SANDBOX/foo.git"
    source: git
    version: "2.0.0"
sdks:
  dart: ">=0.1.2 <1.0.0"
